[Home](./index.md) &gt; [eth-connect](./eth-connect.md) &gt; [BigNumber](./eth-connect.bignumber.md) &gt; [isLessThan](./eth-connect.bignumber.islessthan.md)

## BigNumber.isLessThan() method

Returns `true` if the value of this BigNumber is less than the value of `n`<!-- -->, otherwise returns `false`<!-- -->.

```ts
(0.3 - 0.2) < 0.1                       // true
x = new BigNumber(0.3).minus(0.2)
x.isLessThan(0.1)                       // false
BigNumber(0).isLessThan(x)              // true
BigNumber(11.1, 2).isLessThan(11, 3)    // true

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isLessThan(n: BigNumber.Value, base?: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  n | [BigNumber.Value](./eth-connect.bignumber.value.md) | A numeric value. |
|  base | number | The base of n. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
